short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows communicating with a WA number without a contact. WA = certain popular instant messaging

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One popular instant messaging program requires you to add a contact in order to send a message to. This overcomes the limitation.
